name: Heavymetalfoes Electrum

2 Pendulum Monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up. Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control; destroy it, then add 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. If a card(s) leaves your Pendulum Zone: Draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Heavymetalfoes Electrum" once per turn.
